# The `ExecutorNativePlatform` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Configure the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lljit">LLJIT</a> instance to use the ORC runtime and the detected native target for the executor. <a href="#details">More...</a>
